RelatedSentence: THE Philippine Overseas Employment Agency Regional Center for Mindanao ( POEA - Mindanao ) announced that the Ministry of Health ( MOH ) of Saudi Arabia is in need of 1,600 medical workers .

Carolina B. Agdamag , in Monday 's edition of Kapehan sa Dabaw at SM City Davao Annex , said 1,000 staff nurses , 500 respiratory therapists , and 100 xray specialist are needed for various medical institutions in the Arab country .

A1: vacancies are exclusive for applicants from Mindanao
RelatedSentence: She said job vacancies are exclusive for applicants from Mindanao .
She said job interview and examination will most likely be conducted in Mindanao .
They are currently looking for a venue for the interview and examination of applicants .

RelatedSentence: Agdamag said qualified applicants should register online at www.poea.gov.ph or www.eregister.poea.gov.ph and personally submit their requirements to POEA Mindanao at Quimpo Boulevard , Davao City .
Agdamag said qualified applicants should register online at www.poea.gov.ph or www.eregister.poea.gov.ph and personally submit their requirements to POEA Mindanao at Quimpo Boulevard , Davao City .

She said applicants may also submit their applications to their regional extension offices in Zamboanga City and Cagayan de Oro City and satellite offices in Koronadal City , Butuan City , and Tawi Tawi .

She said applicants may also submit their applications to their regional extension offices in Zamboanga City and Cagayan de Oro City and satellite offices in Koronadal City , Butuan City , and Tawi Tawi .
The deadline for the submission of applications is June 11 , 2014 , Agdamag said .
